entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • RefreshView indicator hidden behind Navigation bar #17610
  • [Android] - Layouting and Coloring of Grid Items in CollectionView wrong when rotating to different orientations #17609
  • Pending Navigations still processing exception when navigating to the page #17608

Closed

  • Border bugs entries #17506
    .NET 8 GA
  • Shell Tabbar Tab Title Selected Text Color & Choppy Animation On Windows #17378

PullRequests

Updated

  • [iOS] Fix downscaled images not occupying correct space #17120
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, .NET 8 GA
  • Fix legacy logical children to correctly add/remove #17410
    t/bug, control-swipeview, .NET 9 Planning
  • Fix menu item command binding (#13848) #14345
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-menubar, stale, Under Consideration
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 GA
  • Update Flyout when Shell.FlyoutContent changes #17359
    area/shell 🐢, partner/hot-reload-xaml, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixed Android's Border background to use a Transparent bg if not othe… #17555
    area/controls 🎮, .NET 8 GA
  • Recreate Details Fragment, if its been destroyed #17604
    .NET 8 GA
  • Recreate the Navigation Host If It's been Destroyed #17594
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Windows] Fix tab colors not updating on add/remove #17591
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, area/desktop 🖥️, .NET 8 GA
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    .NET 8 GA
  • Update SkiaSharp to the latest stable version #17558
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix typo in build.sh #17305
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, community ✨, stale
  • [main] Build the previous .NET version of some nugets #17043
    area/architecture, stale, Under Consideration
  • Make ALL template warnings show up as test errors (not just C# warnings), and produce more diagnostic artifacts #17586
    do-not-merge, area/templates 📄
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17595
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
